Package reactor.fn.support

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelegatingConsumer<T>
    An implementation of Consumer that maintains a list of delegates to which events received by this Consumer will be passed along.
    Resequencer<T>
    A Resequencer allows claimants to ensure proper ordering of replies by allocating long values from a counter.
    SingleUseConsumer<T>
    A Consumer implementation that allows the delegate Consumer to only be called once.
    Tap<T>
    A Tap provides a limited window into an event stream.
    UriUtils
    Utility class for URI encoding and decoding based on RFC 3986.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CancelConsumerException
